mapper.select: SELECT c.city_id, c.city_name, c.city_img, c.city_language, c.city_currency, COUNT(uc.city_id) AS count FROM user_city uc JOIN city c ON uc.city_id = c.city_id WHERE DATE(uc.created_date) = DATE(NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY) -- 전날 데이터 GROUP BY c.city_id, c.city_name, c.city_image_url, c.city_language, c.city_currency ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 1;
